name: The Dark Forest Teaser
description:
A small teaser of our Global Game Jam 2016 entry, The Dark Forest. THIS IS AN ALPHA BUILD. There is no end. Just kill skeletons.

This game was created by Iván Montes, Unai Vidal (@69mrcreeperyt) and Iván Cordero (@ivcoar) for GlobalGameJam 2016.

Enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it.

Instructions

Keyboard

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left click to use the melee attack
  • Right click to use the magic

Joystick

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to look around
  • A to use the melee attack
  • B to use the magic
